about.summary: An R interface to Google's open source JavaScript engine. This  package can now be compiled either with V8 version 6 or 7 (LTS) from  nodejs or with the legacy 3.14/3.15 branch of V8.

name: r-v8
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.0.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-v8
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/V8_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/V8/V8_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9342c7d74b5c985a8c165c6f78f4d1d79d8f298bc055016154b43e77ce6c9033

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1
  skip: true  # [win]
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}grep              # [win]
    - {{ posix }}autoconf
    - {{ posix }}automake          # [not win]
    - {{ posix }}automake-wrapper  # [win]
    - {{ posix }}pkg-config
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcpp >=0.12.12
    - r-curl >=1.0
    - r-jsonlite >=1.0
    - libv8
    - icu >=64.2
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-rcpp >=0.12.12
    - r-curl >=1.0
    - r-jsonlite >=1.0
    - libv8

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('V8')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('V8')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/jeroen/v8 (devel) https://v8.dev (upstream)
  license: MIT
  summary: An R interface to Google's open source JavaScript engine. This  package can now be compiled either with V8 version 6 or 7 (LTS) from  nodejs or with the
    legacy 3.14/3.15 branch of V8.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - xhochy

# Package: V8
# Type: Package
# Title: Embedded JavaScript Engine for R
# Version: 2.3
# Authors@R: person("Jeroen", "Ooms", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "jeroen@berkeley.edu", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-4035-0289"))
# Description: An R interface to Google's open source JavaScript engine. This  package can now be compiled either with V8 version 6 or 7 (LTS) from  nodejs or with the legacy 3.14/3.15 branch of V8.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# URL: https://github.com/jeroen/v8 (devel) https://v8.dev (upstream)
# BugReports: https://github.com/jeroen/v8/issues
# SystemRequirements: V8 version 6 or 7 is recommended, but 3.14 (legacy) is still supported as well. On Debian / Ubuntu you need either libv8-dev or libnode-dev, on Fedora use v8-devel.
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Imports: Rcpp (>= 0.12.12), jsonlite (>= 1.0), curl (>= 1.0), utils
# LinkingTo: Rcpp
# Suggests: testthat, knitr, rmarkdown
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Language: en-US
# Packaged: 2019-07-02 09:56:44 UTC; jeroen
# Author: Jeroen Ooms [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0002-4035-0289>)
# Maintainer: Jeroen Ooms <jeroen@berkeley.edu>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-07-02 10:51:07 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
